verses.1: Topa aw, nangma tungah thu kong ngen hi.
verses.2: Ka Pasian aw, nangmah kong muang hi. Hong zahhuaisak kei in. Keima tungah ka galte gualzo-in lungdamsak kei in.
verses.3: Nangmah a hong ngakte kuamah zahhuaisak kei in. Thu khual loin a zuautheite zahhuaisak in.
verses.4: Topa aw, na zia na tong a thei-in hong bawl inla, na lampite hong hilh in.
verses.5: Na thuman sungah kei hong paipih inla, lam hong hilh in. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei a hong hon Pasian na hi a, nang kong muang tawntung hi.
verses.6: Topa aw, tanglai pek a kipan a om sa ahih manin, na hehpihna le na itna kip hong phawkkik in.
verses.7: Topa aw, ka khangno lai-a ka mawhna le ka khialhnate ciamteh kei inla, na hoihna na ngaihsutna le na itna kip tawh kizui-in kei hong phawk in!
verses.8: Topa hoihin thutang hi. Tua ahih manin mimawhte lam a hilh hi.
verses.9: Amah in lungsim kiniamkhiatte a man ah paipihin a zia a tong a hilh hi.
verses.10: Ama thuciamna le a thupiak a zuite adingin Topa始 lampi pen itna kip le cihtakna ahi hi.
verses.11: Topa aw, ka mawhna lian ahih manin, nangma min phat nadingin keima mawhna hong maisak in.
verses.12: Topa a zahtak mi kua ahi hiam? Ama lampi zuih ding Pasian始 hilhna a ngah mi ahi hi.
verses.13: Amah nuamsa tawntung dinga, a tate in leitang nei ding uh hi.
verses.14: Topa tawh kilawmtatna pen amah a zahtakte ading hi a, a thuciamna amau tungah kitheithangsak hi.
verses.15: Topa始 lam ka en tawntung hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ngenthang panin ka khete hong sut khia ding hi.
verses.16: Kei lamah nang hong kihei-in, kei hong hehpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh kei guak bek hi-in gimna ka thuak hi.
verses.17: Ka lungsim natnate khempeuh hong damsak inla, ka gimnate khempeuh panin hong paikhiatpih in.
verses.18: Ka gimna le ka thuaknate hong ngaihsun inla, ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak in.
verses.19: Ka galte bangzah takin a tamna le kei hong muhdah luatnate hong ngaihsun in.
verses.20: Kei hong cing inla, hong hon khia in. Nangmah hong bel ka hih manin kei hong maizumsak kei in.
verses.21: Nang hong muang ka hih manin, kicinna le thutanna in kei hong kem tahen.
verses.22: Pasian aw, amau始 haksatna khempeuh panin na mi Israel-te hon khia ta in.
